title: Haru Hayate
sinopse:
A collection of Mizumaru Anzai's one-shots from Garo.

1. Nishikaze no Fuku Machi
2. Hikishio no Koro
3. Nobi
4. Haru Hayate
5. Magarimichi
6. Yuki-doke no Koro
7. Ki Tonbo
8. Shuuka Tetsudou (A Train at the End of Summer)
9. Teitai Zensen
10. Fuyu Machi
11. Kitsune-gari
12. Mugibue
13. Hana Monogatari
